Class WebSpaceManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.server.data.WebSpaceManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnambiguityPovider<java.lang.String>, WebSpaceManager

    public class WebSpaceManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements WebSpaceManager
    The default implementation of WebSpaceManager.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

      • getPrivateKey

        public byte[] getPrivateKey(WebSpace webSpace,
                            byte[] passphrase)
                     throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: WebSpaceManager
        Returns the given webspace's encrypted private key.
        Specified by:
        getPrivateKey in interface WebSpaceManager
        Parameters:
        webSpace - The webspace thats private key should be returned.
        passphrase - The passphrase needed to request the private key.
        Returns:
        The private key of the given webspace.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - Is thrown if there is no stored private key for the given webspace.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given passphrase is invalid.
